title: Just a reminder... Less than FOUR MONTHS UNTIL U.R.F. COMES BACK! :D
body:
http://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--SXfKoau1--/18r3q9isq1e56gif.gif
Only fourth months! I can't wait!

replies.body: Illaoi URF anyone?

> [{quoted}](name=B1naryB0t,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ONjI642P,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-06T21:23:43.853+0000)
>
> Illaoi URF anyone?

Honestly I think she'd get destroyed, too much mobility and ranged harass constantly. She'd just get destroyed by most of the popular picks, now if someone were to pick a pure melee champ... R.I.P

Her E is enough harass to spook the heck out of anyone. People can spam abilities on the person who got E'd.
And landing her E is based on how good you are at aiming. Her W will be oppresive too.
Her Q is completely useless though

> [{quoted}](name=B1naryB0t,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ONjI642P,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-06T21:23:43.853+0000)
>
> Illaoi URF anyone?

dude don't give people any ideas x) shut uppppp!!!

I'd be more scared of One for All Illaoi

THE TENTACLES AHHHHHHH!!!!
Oh gawd... Pls no... http://www.gifbin.com/bin/g600616996.gif
{{champion:420}}: so much motion... it will be glorious O.O
ad malz urf. He he he
If you don't take outer turret by 2 minutes, you're doing it wrong
If you don't kill half your jungle, take dragon and lawnmove the bot lane before 4 minutes you're doing it wrong.
so OP!
NO don't get me excited now!!!
It will be fun the first and second day, the third one will be shacocon/katacon/hasagicon 2016 because tryhards.
Why do people like URF? the butt hurt and rage in those games is 10x worse than any other game mode i have seen.

> [{quoted}](name=Makior72,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ONjI642P,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-06T21:11:50.003+0000)
>
> Why do people like URF? the butt hurt and rage in those games is 10x worse than any other game mode i have seen.

It's only bad when people play just to win and you see the same champs over, and over, and over and over.
I'm looking at you Sona, Shaco and Ezreal.

But what if i main shaco?
http://imgur.com/aiZxSI5
Then you play when they were trying to make it and clear the entire jungle at once... while in lane.

> [{quoted}](name=Makior72,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ONjI642P,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-06T21:11:50.003+0000)
>
> Why do people like URF? the butt hurt and rage in those games is 10x worse than any other game mode i have seen.

You have never been anything OP in urf have you?
Prolly played friggin {{champion:14}} expecting something special
time to hibernate!
I never playes Urf before. Can somebody tell me whats it about? :)

Basically everyone gets buffed in every aspect, so everything is OP. Imagine a Wukong stealth on a short enough cooldown where you are constantly stealthed and cant be hit. Ikr. If everyone is OP, no one is.
Huh. Sounds like big shtstorm lol. Are there any rewards or icons? :D

There was the 99,999 RP icon (which was a joke, it was actually like 1k IP) and various other icons.

In addition urf gave the IP reward of double the time in game (20 minutes in urf = 40 minute SR game in terms of IP)

Plus it was hilarious fun when people build all damage, then there are those people who are dicks and go tank WW/galio and don't die at all late game.
Cant wait to check it out. Thanks for your time!

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosThief,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ONjI642P,comment-id=0009000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-07T01:08:26.560+0000)
>
> There was the 99,999 RP icon (which was a joke, it was actually like 1k IP) and various other icons.
> 
> In addition urf gave the IP reward of double the time in game (20 minutes in urf = 40 minute SR game in terms of IP)
> 
> Plus it was hilarious fun when people build all damage, then there are those people who are dicks and go tank WW/galio and don't die at all late game.

What icon?
can't tell if this guy is serious.... i'm leaning towards not, but I can't be sure.... because it's the icon he's using at the time of writing this.
cool. time for fizz to destroy everyone

3 months beforehand and all I would like to get rito's attention to make it more fun. 

\#butthat'snoneomybusiness

Can't wait for the never-ending Brand stun :3
URF 4 Prez 2016
[Hadouken!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pfhK2F0WoXE)
URF lost alot of its magic the second the OP picks were known.
Darius can spin right round baby, like a record baby right round. And get all that life steal forever and ever.

New poppy ult in U.R.F. 

Me gusta

i never played this mode, but i cant wait for it

also never played doom bots, ascension, poro king

i played in my first account from s1 until lissandra and aram's release then i stopped, i returned when ekko was in his first free week
